articles.title: Russian missiles hit centre of Kyiv as world leaders gather in Europe - Reuters
articles.description: Russian missiles struck the Ukrainian capital Kyiv on Sunday, a day after a key eastern city fell to pro-Russian forces in a major set-back for Ukraine and as world leaders gathered in Europe to discuss further sanctions against Moscow.

articles.title: WHO says monkeypox not currently a global health emergency - EWN
articles.description: A surge of monkeypox cases has been detected since early May outside of the West and Central African countries where the disease has long been endemic. Most of the new cases have been in Western Europe.
